author: Aris Folley
title: New bill would withhold pay from Senate until coronavirus stimulus package passes
description: Sen. Martha McSally (R-Ariz.) has introduced legislation that would withhold pay from all Senate members until the chamber passes a coronavirus stimulus package in response to national outbreak."If Americans aren't...
